name: Tactical Advantage
ability: Order: Boost an allied unit by 6.

name: Crystal Skull
ability: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5 and give it Veil.

name: Cursed Scroll
ability: Order: Draw a card of your choice, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.

name: Magic Lamp
ability: Order: Transform into Lamp Djinn.

name: Oneiromancy
ability:
Echo.
Play any card from your deck.

name: Korathi Heatwave
ability: Banish a unit or an artifact.

name: Roach
ability: When you play a gold card, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.

name: Geralt of Rivia
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.

name: Alzur's Double-Cross
ability: Play the highest-power unit from your deck.

name: Chironex
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, damage it by 6 instead. If you have Unicorn in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.

name: Unicorn
ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. If you control Chironex, boost it by 6 instead. If you have Chironex in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.

name: Ihuarraquax
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Melee row.
Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Ranged row.

name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.

name: Musicians of Blaviken
ability: If you have no other 0-provision cost cards in your starting deck, start on your Ranged row.

name: Olgierd: Immortal
ability: This card's power cannot be changed by other abilities.

name: Royal Decree
ability: Play a unit from your deck.

name: Vigo's Muzzle
ability: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.

name: Scorch
ability:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.

name: Pellar
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Banish a card from your opponent's graveyard.

name: Villentretenmerth
ability:
Lineage.
Timer 2: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on the battlefield, excluding Dragons you control.

name: Myrgtabrakke
ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Draw a Dragon, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Lineage.

name: Ocvist
ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 2 turns.
Timer 3: Damage all enemy units by 1.

name: Renew
ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed.

name: Aerondight
ability:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by the value of the Advantage, then boost the lowest-power allied unit by the excess damage dealt.

name: Dandelion: Poet
ability: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.

name: Regis
ability:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.

name: Saesenthessis: Blaze
ability:
Lineage.
While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit is destroyed or Banished during your turn, boost self by 1.

name: Eskel: Pathfinder
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with a primary category that is not in your starting deck.

name: Geralt: Igni
ability:
Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 35 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 20 or more power instead.

name: Lambert: Swordmaster
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all copies of that unit on your opponent's side by 3.

name: Ornate Censer
ability: Swap the power of the highest- and lowest-power unit on the battlefield.

name: Phoenix
ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality (3).
At the start of the round, while in your graveyard, Banish self, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling on a random allied row.

name: Portal
ability:
Deploy: Summon a random 0-provision cost unit from your deck to the left of this card.
Timer 3: Summon a random 0-provision cost unit from your deck to the right of this card.

name: Syanna
ability: Order: Repeat the Deploy ability of the next unit you play during this turn.

name: Triss: Telekinesis
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a bronze special card from either player's starting deck.

name: Curse of Corruption
ability: Destroy the highest-power unit.

name: Iris von Everec
ability: Deathwish: Boost all enemy units by 2.

name: Land of a Thousand Fables
ability: Deploy: Play a special card from your deck.

name: Avallac'h: Sage
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.

name: Lady of the Lake
ability: Deploy: Play an Echo card from your deck.

name: Merigold's Hailstorm
ability: Damage 5 enemy units by 3.

name: Snowdrop
ability:
Zeal. Order: Draw up to 2 cards, then shuffle the same number of cards back into your deck.
Whenever you draw a card, boost self by 2.

name: Triangle Within a Triangle
ability: Boost an allied unit by its provision cost, or damage an enemy unit by its provision cost.

name: Bekker's Rockslide
ability: Damage a unit by 8.

name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.

name: Necromancy
ability: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.

name: Tempest
ability: Play all copies of Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain from your deck.

name: Alzur's Thunder
ability:
Damage a unit by 5.
Deathblow: If it was an enemy, damage adjacent units by 1.

name: Biting Frost
ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.

name: Impenetrable Fog
ability: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.

name: Torrential Rain
ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.

name: Spores
ability: Reset the power of a unit.

name: Oxenfurt Scholar
ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each card with a provision cost of 14 or higher in your starting deck.

name: Epidemic
ability: Destroy a 0 or 1 provision cost unit.

name: Madoc
ability:
Whenever you play a Bomb, Summon self from your deck or graveyard to random allied row.
Order: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 1 turn, then destroy self.
